content.question: Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="K sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub 2 equals, the fraction 1 over the square root of 2, end fraction, times K sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="K sub 2 equals one half K sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
